sentences.en: Askew used several names, and had a reputation as an eccentric.
sentences.cn: 艾斯丘用过几个名字，并以“怪人”著称。

sentences.en: Aunt Nessy was always a bit eccentric.
sentences.cn: 内西姑妈总是有点古怪。

sentences.en: Don't conceal the poverty of thought by the eccentric diction.
sentences.cn: 不要用这些怪僻的词藻来掩饰思想的贫乏.

sentences.en: Geniuses are supposed to be eccentric and hopelessly impractical.
sentences.cn: 天才通常都被认为行为古怪而且毫无实践能力。

sentences.en: Great chess players have a reputation for being both eccentric and argumentative.
sentences.cn: 国际象棋大师们以性格怪异和好与人争辩而闻名。

sentences.en: He had the name of an eccentric.
He is an eccentric character who likes wearing a beret and dark glasses.
sentences.cn: 他人很怪，喜欢戴贝雷帽和墨镜。

sentences.en: Her fey charm and eccentric ways were legendary.
sentences.cn: 她难以捉摸的魅力和怪异的行事方式都成了传奇。

sentences.en: His actions since that morning have been eccentric and unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 自从那天早晨,他的行动一直是反常而不可捉摸.

sentences.en: His eccentric behaviour lost him his job.
sentences.cn: 他古怪的行为使他丢了工作。

sentences.en: His methods were unorthodox, and his lifestyle eccentric.
sentences.cn: 他的方法不同寻常，他的生活方式也相当奇特。

sentences.en: How odd they have gone through the eccentric thing!
sentences.cn: 他们经历了多么离奇古怪的事!

sentences.en: I dare say you think me eccentric, or supersensitive, or something absurd.
sentences.cn: 你当然要说我这是乖僻古怪, 或者说过于敏感, 或者说荒庭不经的了.

sentences.en: She is so eccentric that she is regarded as a bit of a curiosity.
sentences.cn: 她非常古怪,算是个奇人.

sentences.en: The eccentric mass type vibration generators are bolted to the platform.
sentences.cn: 偏心量型式的振动发生器锚固在台身上.

sentences.en: The old lady is a bit of an eccentric.
sentences.cn: 这位老太是个有点古怪的人.

sentences.en: We thought this very characteristic of his eccentric gentleness.
sentences.cn: 我们认为这就是他那种与众不同的宽宏大量的特色.

sentences.en: Yet so eccentric that all marvel at her.

words.tran_cn: 古怪；怪癖；[数] 离心率

trans.tran_en: behaving in a way that is unusual and different from most people
someone who behaves in a way that is different from what is usual or socially accepted

trans.tran_cn: 古怪(的)，偏执(的)，不同心(的)
trans.tran_en: An eccentric is an eccentric person
